main.name: Alex Liu
main.bio: I'm a software developer with a focus in fullstack development. I've worked on all sorts of projects at different companies, including mobile apps, websites, hardware apis, etc. When I'm not hard at work polishing a React.js UI or building out a Ruby on Rails API, I can usually be found on Discord gaming with my friends, going to the gym, or in the kitchen trying out a new Youtube recipe.

resume.skillmessage: These are the tech stacks I'm most familiar with.
